name: KanjiKing Elementary
description:
Game app questionnaire to select the correct English word for the Kanji.

- Education game that will teach/test your ability to read Japanese/Chinese characters.
- Great for students of the Japanese Language Proficiency Test (JLPT).
- Great for Japanese or Chinese students of English, test your English skills.
- Over 1,000 questions.
- Includes all 1,006 Kanji taught in Japanese elementary schools.
- Divided into 6 grades for each elementary school grade.
